This product uses publicly available data from the U.S. National Library of Medicine (NLM), National Institutes of Health, Department of Health and Human Services; NLM is not responsible for the product and does not endorse or recommend this or any other product.

This application is intended for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice. The use of this application and the information provided is at your own risk. NLM Disclaimer It is not the intention of NLM to provide specific medical advice, but rather to provide users with information to better understand their health and their medications. NLM urges you to consult with a qualified physician for advice about medications. DrugBank Disclaimer DrugBank is intended for educational and scientific research purposes only and you expressly acknowledge and agree that use of DrugBank is at your sole risk. The accuracy of DrugBank information is not guaranteed and reliance on DrugBank shall be at your sole risk. DrugBank is not intended as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment..[www.drugbank.ca] Citing DrugBank Wishart DS, Knox C, Guo AC, Shrivastava S, Hassanali M, Stothard P, Chang Z, Woolsey J. DrugBank: a comprehensive resource for in silico drug discovery and exploration. Nucleic Acids Res. 2006 Jan 1;34(Database issue):D668-72. 16381955.
Offline Mode Offline mode allows you to view cached items even without internet connection.

In offline mode, Search feature will lookup on cached list only.

Note: Data in offline mode maybe outdated and some features may not be available. Show recent searches Marketed Drug Search recent searches even without internet connection.

In offline mode, Search feature will Enabling Marketed Drug search may take considerable amount of time depending on the genericity of item. Clear cache Cache contains all previously viewed items. Clearing this will affect the features of offline mode.
